title: 27_01_08_LP_Manchester
description:
Manchester, England
Manchester Evening News Arena
27th January 2008

Setlist:
01. Wake
02. Given Up
03. Lying From You
04. Somewhere I Belong
05. No More Sorrow
06. Don&#039;t Stay
07. Points Of Authority
08. In Pieces
09. Numb
10. My December (Piano Version)
11. Breaking The Habit
12. Shadow Of The Day
13. Crawling
14. In The End
15. A Place For My Head
16. One Step Closer
17. In Between
18. What I&#039;ve Done
19. Bleed It Out
20. Faint

Show Notes:
- &#039;It&#039;s Goin&#039; Down&#039; was over &#039;Points Of Authority&#039;.
- Mike messed up on the &#039;Points Of Authority&#039; intro, possibly because fans up front were rapping &#039;Petrified&#039; over it, so Mike got mixed up, laughed it off, and finished the intro.
- Mike revealed that live footage from the European tour would be used to make their &#039;Given Up&#039; video.
- Near the end of the intro to &#039;A Place For My Head&#039;, a fan threw a glowstick at the stage and hit the box right in front of Brad, who stopped and eyed the guy out, which caused many fans to laugh at the look on Brad&#039;s face that he gave the fan.

thx to lplive.net for the info ;)
